crow_a.title: Absolutely no risk
crow_a.desc:
Open source smart contract uploaded
to the Ethereum Blockchain. One of the most
secure and popular cryptocurrencies in the
market.

crow_b.title: The system cannot be hacked
crow_b.desc:
It is not possible to change the algorithm or
delete the participants' rooms. The system is
able to work without a site. The site is needed
only for the display of statistics and progress.

crow_c.title: Non Hierarchically Organized
crow_c.desc:
A crowdfunded decentralized matrix project
specifically designed to stimulate a global
relocation to the crypto ecosystem by offering
newcomers a seamless introductory experience.

crow_d.title: Smart Contracts are easy and simple
crow_d.desc:
It is easy to understand even for those who
have not encountered such projects.

crow_e.title: Transactional Surety
crow_e.desc:
Ethereum network nodes irrevocably record and
store the transactional history of all Neun network
participants on the Blockchain.

crow_f.title: Instant payouts, cheating excluded
crow_f.desc:
The smart contract does not control
the money. All transactions are 100% from
person to person. Anonymous in every way.

crow_h.title: Indefinite term
crow_h.desc:
Smart contract will exist as long as the
Ethereum blockchain exists, and even the
creators of a smart contract will not be able
to delete or change its terms.
